history.proof: intros A p. induction p using prechain_ind. - left. exists m. reflexivity. - right. shelve.

exceptions.exn: Tactic failure: The relation ex is not a declared reflexive relation. Maybe you need to require the Coq.Classes.RelationClasses library.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)

Premises:
Inductive prechain (A : Set) : Set := single : Map A -> prechain A | concat : prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A For prechain: Argument scope is [type_scope] For single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For concat: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
concat : forall A : Set, prechain A -> Map A -> prechain A
single : forall A : Set, Map A -> prechain A
map_sum : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), m = M0 A \/ (exists (a : ad) (x : A), m = M1 A a x) \/ (exists x y : Map A, m = M2 A x y)
prechain_rec : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Set), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
prechain_rect : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Type), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
pair_sp : forall (B C : Type) (x : B * C), x = (fst x, snd x)
MapCard_Put1_equals_2 : forall (A : Type) (p : positive) (a a' : ad) (y y' : A), MapCard A (MapPut1 A a y a' y' p) = 2
MapSweep_semantics_3 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A), MapSweep A f m = None -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f a y = false
N.eqb_refl : forall x : N, (x =? x)%N = true
MapPut_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut A m a y = MapMerge A m (M1 A a y)
MapPut_behind_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut_behind A m a y = MapMerge A (M1 A a y) m
MapCard_is_one_unique : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapCard A m = 1 -> forall (a a' : ad) (y y' : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> MapGet A m a' = Some y' -> a = a' /\ y = y'
MapSweep_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad), MapSweep1 A f pf m = None -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f (pf a) y = false
MapSweep_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> MapGet A m a = Some y
MapSweep_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep A f m = Some (a, y) -> f a y = true
MapSweep_semantics_1_1 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad) (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep1 A f pf m = Some (a, y) -> f a y = true
M1_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a = Some y
MapCard_Put_sum : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A) (n n' : nat), m' = MapPut A m a y -> n = MapCard A m -> n' = MapCard A m' -> {n' = n} + {n' = S n}
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
MapFold_ext_f : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M) (f g : ad -> A -> M) (m : Map A), (forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f a y = g a y) -> MapFold A M neutral op f m = MapFold A M neutral op g m
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
alist_of_Map_semantics_1_1 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A) (pf : ad -> ad) (a : ad) (y : A), alist_semantics A (MapFold1 A (alist A) (anil A) (aapp A) (fun (a0 : ad) (y0 : A) => acons A (a0, y0) (anil A)) pf m) a = Some y -> {a' : ad | a = pf a'}
MapPut_behind_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut_behind A (M2 A m m') a y = (if N.odd a then M2 A m (MapPut_behind A m' (N.div2 a) y) else M2 A (MapPut_behind A m (N.div2 a) y) m')
MapPut_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut A (M2 A m m') a y = (if N.odd a then M2 A m (MapPut A m' (N.div2 a) y) else M2 A (MapPut A m (N.div2 a) y) m')
MapEmptyp_complete : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapEmptyp A m = true -> m = M0 A
MapFold_ext_f_1 : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M) (m : Map A) (f g : ad -> A -> M) (pf : ad -> ad), (forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A m a = Some y -> f (pf a) y = g (pf a) y) -> MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf m = MapFold1 A M neutral op g pf m
MapCard_is_O : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapCard A m = 0 -> forall a : ad, MapGet A m a = None
MapRemove_as_RestrBy_c : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : B), MapRemove A m a = MapDomRestrBy A B m (M1 B a y)
BinNatDef.N.succ_double = fun x : N => match x with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end : N -> N Argument scope is [N_scope]
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
MapMerge_m_empty_1 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapMerge A m (M0 A) = m
MapMerge_empty_m_1 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapMerge A (M0 A) m = m
MapMerge_empty_m_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapMerge A (M0 A) m = m
MapDelta_empty_m_1 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapDelta A (M0 A) m = m
MapDelta_m_empty_1 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapDelta A m (M0 A) = m
MapFold_Put_disjoint_1 : forall (A M : Type) (neutral : M) (op : M -> M -> M), (forall a : M, op neutral a = a) -> (forall a : M, op a neutral = a) -> (forall a b : M, op a b = op b a) -> forall (p : positive) (f : ad -> A -> M) (pf : ad -> ad) (a1 a2 : ad) (y1 y2 : A), N.lxor a1 a2 = N.pos p -> MapFold1 A M neutral op f pf (MapPut1 A a1 y1 a2 y2 p) = op (f (pf a1) y1) (f (pf a2) y2)
MapDelta_nilpotent_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> MapDelta A m m = M0 A

induction p using prechain_ind.
- left. exists m. reflexivity.
- right. exists x, y, p. reflexivity.
